name: Influx (itch) (Martin)
description:
A (very) short game made in relation to my bachelor's thesis.

(Downloadable version recommended) 

Thank you for looking!

How To play

  • WASD to walk
  • "E" to interact

Known issues:

  • The browser version has graphical and audio issues
  • In the room with the green door, the hint is not always displayed properly. 
    • The hint is that a specific input is needed
  • The player can get stuck in the dark during the final sequence
    • Until this is fixed, I'd recommend following the light 

If any more issues come up, please let me know (:
